OrgName.entry: RUGBY LEAGUE COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION PROGRAMME

Desc.entry: A registered charity that delivers the Rugby Football Leagues whole sport plan objectives on a local level. Also delivers 6 week coaching blocks in primary and secondary schools with male and female classes. Covers development of all aspects of the sport in Sheffield, Barnsley, Rotherham, North Derbyshire and Derbyshire. Organises the Primary School Annual Festival of "Tag" Rugby League in July and organises summer camps and amateur clubs.
